info.title: Farming IoT API
info.description: API documentation for Farming IoT backend

post.description: Receives data from IoT devices, including air_temperature, air_humidity, and optionally soil_humidity. An API key is required in the headers.

air_temperature.description: Air temperature reading from the device.

air_humidity.description: Air humidity reading from the device.

soil_humidity.description: Soil humidity reading from the device (optional).

message.example: Data stored successfully
Invalid data. Please ensure all required fields (device_id, air_temperature, air_humidity, soil_humidity) are provided and valid.

500.description: An error occurred while storing the data.

message.example: An error occurred while storing the data.

get.summary: Get average air temperature, air humidity, and soil humidity for devices
get.description: Returns the average air temperature, air humidity, and soil humidity for devices within a specified time range. Requires an API key in the headers.

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: The start of the time range in ISO 8601 format 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS' (e.g., '2024-10-01T10:30:00').

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: The end of the time range in ISO 8601 format 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS' (e.g., '2024-10-01T11:30:00').

200.description: Average air temperature, air humidity, soil humidity, area, and status for each device in the time range.

message.example: Please provide both start_time and end_time, or leave both empty for the default time range.

500.description: An error occurred while fetching data.

message.example: An error occurred while fetching data.

get.summary: Get average air temperature, air humidity, and soil humidity for devices within the last X seconds
get.description: Returns the average air temperature, air humidity, and soil humidity for devices in the last X seconds. Requires an API key in the headers.

schema.description: The time range in seconds (between 60 and 86400 seconds).

200.description: Average air temperature, air humidity, soil humidity, area, and status for each device within the last X seconds.

message.example: The time range must be between 60 seconds (1 minute) and 86400 seconds (24 hours).

500.description: An error occurred while fetching data.

message.example: An error occurred while fetching data.

get.summary: Get daily humidity averages for devices within a date range
get.description: Fetches the daily average humidity readings for IoT devices between start_date and end_date. The date range cannot exceed 7 days.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date in YYYY-MM-DD format. Must not exceed 7 days from start_date

200.description: Successful response with daily humidity averages for devices

400.description: Invalid request. Possible issues include missing start_date or end_date, invalid date format, or date range exceeding 7 days.

message.example: Invalid date format. Use YYYY-MM-DD.

500.description: Server error. An error occurred while fetching data.

message.example: An error occurred while fetching data.

post.description: Create a new alert for monitoring soil humidity. Requires an API key in the headers.

time_window.description: Time window in minutes during which the condition must be met (1 minute to 1440 minutes).

emails.description: Comma-separated list of email addresses to notify.

status.description: Status of the alert (true for active, false for inactive).

message.example: Alert created successfully

name.example: Humedad del suelo mayor a 80 en un minuto

message.example: Missing required fields: product_id, name, condition, operator, threshold, emails, status, time_window

500.description: An error occurred while creating the alert.

message.example: An error occurred while creating the alert.

get.description: Fetches a single alert by its ID. Requires an API key in the headers.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the alert to retrieve.

alert_name.example: Humedad del suelo menor a 70 en un minuto

message.example: The ID must be a numeric value.
Alert with id 19 not found.

500.description: An error occurred while fetching the alert

message.example: An error occurred while fetching the alert.

put.description: Edit an existing alert for monitoring soil humidity. Requires an API key in the headers.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the alert to update.

time_window.description: Time window in minutes during which the condition must be met (1 minute to 1440 minutes).

emails.description: Comma-separated list of email addresses to notify.

status.description: Status of the alert (true for active, false for inactive).

message.example: Alert updated successfully

400.description: Bad Request due to validation errors.

message.example: Invalid operator. Allowed operators are: >, <, >=, <=, =
Alert not found

500.description: An error occurred while updating the alert.

message.example: An error occurred while updating the alert.

delete.description: Marks an alert as deleted by setting its status to false and adding the current date to `deleted_at`. Requires an API key in the headers.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the alert to delete

message.example: Alert deleted successfully

name.example: Humedad del suelo mayor a 80 en un minuto

message.example: The ID must be a numeric value.
Alert not found
An error occurred while deleting the alert

get.description: Returns a list of alerts, paginated. Requires an API key in the headers.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination. Defaults to 1.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items per page. Defaults to 10.

alert_name.example: Humedad del suelo menor a 70 en un minuto

500.description: An error occurred while fetching alerts

message.example: An error occurred while fetching alerts.

get.description: Returns a list of triggered alerts, paginated and ordered by the most recent triggered date. Requires an API key in the headers.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination. Defaults to 1.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items per page. Defaults to 10.

500.description: An error occurred while fetching triggered alerts

message.example: An error occurred while fetching triggered alerts.

post.summary: Send an email with optional attachment
post.description: This endpoint allows you to send an email with a dynamic template and an optional attachment.

to.description: Recipient email address (comma-separated for multiple recipients).

htmlContent.description: HTML content of the email to replace `{{content}}` in the template.
htmlContent.example: Your account details have been updated successfully.

attachment.description: Optional file to attach to the email.

message.example: Email sent successfully

400.description: Bad request due to missing required fields or invalid input.

message.example: Missing required fields: to, subject, htmlContent.

500.description: Failed to send email due to server error.

message.example: Failed to send email
